So if you were on the Northern Line tonight and some nob in gym gear managed to faint. Thank you! That nob was me #tube #London
Reminded tonight how lovely Londoners are. Fainted on the tube & so many people rushed around to help me get up and home safely...
@Bethh2 Not like father that...
@Bethh2 Yep, thought he was locked out of sky on TV i was like OH SHIT. I said I would pay for extra devices on skygo, he didnt listen haha
@Bethh2 apparently not anymore. Got a very very angry text from Dad saying I owe him Â£111 for this months Sky oooops
@Bethh2 No apparently you can only make one change a month and by me removing his and watching stuff I added mine! He's got to wait till Feb
@Bethh2 I may have locked Dad out of his account by removing his ipad. I think he's plannin on disowning me
I am wearing my skinny jeans on a not so skinny day. This is worse than the tube strikes
@SkyUK I registered a device by accident on Skygo - is there any way of getting the old device registered again before the next month?
Walking 2 miles left to work. Passing buses that look like they may topple over. On the up side, I get a scenic workout. Happy tube strike
